name: MUSHA
description:
MUSHA is a SEGA GENESIS game that is a fan favorite among shooter fans for its intense and exciting gameplay. The player controls Terri, a girl who pilots a MUSHA (Metallic Uniframe Super Hybrid Armor). Terri’s goal is to eliminate Dire 51, an Intellicomputer that has gone out of control and is planning an offensive attack upon humanity. Use special weapons like the Vanishing Buster, Blazing Beam, and Defensive Detonator, along with offensive options that allow six types of formation fire, to battle through seven exhilarating levels to finally reach and destroy Dire 51 once and for all!

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
